mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of Peter Guerrant, Deceased (former guardian of Willaim B. Shockey and John Shockey)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of Peter Guerrant, Deceased (former guardian of Willaim B. Shockey and John Shockey) J. T. Jett, Administrator, de bonis non (subsequent administrator), Guardian of Peter Guerrant. William B. Shockey has reached age 21. J. T. Jett is now the guardian of John Shockey W. H. Morgan, Commissioner for Accounts Recorded on ledger page 24 Book 2, in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
